news.title: Rogue agents and shadow AI: Why VCs are betting big on AI security
news.summary: Misaligned agents are just one layer of the AI security challenge that startup Witness AI is trying to solve. It detects employee use of unapproved tools, blocking attacks, and ensuring compliance.

news.title: Netflix revises Warner Bros. bid to an all-cash offer
news.summary: Netflix has updated the acquisition terms for its Warner Bros. Discovery offer to an all-cash deal, replacing its initial $82.7 billion cash and stock agreement. news.title: Sony’s TV business is being taken over by TCL
